description: {"blocks":[{"key":"19j5e","text":"This protocol describes library preparation for combined 18S+16S amplicon metabarcoding with the Illumina MiSeq system. Seawater samples were collected from California rocky intertidal habitats, filtered using Sterivex capsules, and extracted with Qiagen DNeasy Blood \u0026 Tissue kits (see related protocols). This protocol is modified from:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1m6mq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ua1c","text":"Illumina 16S Sample Preparation Guide","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":37}],"data":{}},{"key":"9eo6s","text":"CALeDNA Metabarcoding Library Preparation","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":41}],"data":{}},{"key":"72tmv","text":"Amaral-Zettler, L.A., McCliment, E.A., Ducklow, H.W. and Huse, S.M., 2009. A method for studying protistan diversity using massively parallel sequencing of V9 hypervariable regions of small-subunit ribosomal RNA genes. PloS one,4(7), p.e6372.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":219,"length":8},{"style":"italic","offset":228,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":75,"length":142}],"data":{}},{"key":"cgoi8","text":"Ørberg, S.B., Krause‐Jensen, D., Geraldi, N.R., Ortega, A., Díaz‐Rúa, R. and Duarte, C.M., 2022. Fingerprinting Arctic and North Atlantic Macroalgae with eDNA–Application and perspectives. Environmental DNA,4(2), pp.385-401.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":189,"length":17},{"style":"italic","offset":207,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":97,"length":91}],"data":{}},{"key":"2j1l4","text":"Kelly, R.P., O’Donnell, J.L., Lowell, N.C., Shelton, A.O., Samhouri, J.F., Hennessey, S.M., Feist, B.E. and Williams, G.D., 2016. Genetic signatures of ecological diversity along an urbanization gradient. PeerJ,4, p.e2444.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":205,"length":5},{"style":"italic","offset":211,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":130,"length":74}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"1AF5A3BDDB8B11ECBBC20A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://support.illumina.com/content/dam/illumina-support/documents/documentation/chemistry_documentation/16s/16s-metagenomic-library-prep-guide-15044223-b.pdf"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"1AF5A401DB8B11ECBBC20A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://ucedna.com/methods-for-researchers"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6A57AA70DB8B11ECBA21410DD2A4E6BB","url":"https://journals.plos.org/plosone/article?id=10.1371/journal.pone.0006372"}},"3":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"4067E310DB8B11ECBA21410DD2A4E6BB","url":"https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/full/10.1002/edn3.262"}},"4":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B8094650DB8D11ECBA21410DD2A4E6BB","url":"https://peerj.com/articles/2444/"}}}}

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"2q302","text":"This protocol requires a laboratory set up for standard PCR, gel electrophoresis and imaging, DNA quantitation, and cold storage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5nlak","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fo3f9","text":"See CALeDNA Library Preparation protocols and Illumina 16S Sample Prep Guide for detailed lists of instruments and consumables. See UCSB Genetics Core for an example sequencing facility with appropriate equipment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":19},{"key":1,"offset":55,"length":21},{"key":2,"offset":132,"length":18}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"F0D6643DDB8B11ECBBC20A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://ucedna.com/methods-for-researchers"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"BD8AA8B0DB8F11ECABADE5C27E3955DC","url":"https://support.illumina.com/content/dam/illumina-support/documents/documentation/chemistry_documentation/16s/16s-metagenomic-library-prep-guide-15044223-b.pdf"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6E818EC9391411ED9A700A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.cnsi.ucsb.edu/facilities/biological-nanostructures/genetics-core"}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"eko4n","text":"Dilute primers to 10 uM in PCR water. Dilute BSA to 4 mg/ml in PCR water. Set up triplicate PCRs for each sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"n9gk","text":"Perform PCRs in 25 ul volumes with the following reaction chemistry:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aiofd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c78rt","text":"12.5 ul   NEBNext Ultra II Q5 Master Mix (#M0544)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"92g9t","text":"0.5 ul     4 mg/ml bovine serum albumin (BSA)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6o4km","text":"1.25 ul   10 uM fwd primer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dveui","text":"1.25 ul   10 uM rvs primer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2sobj","text":"1 ul        undiluted DNA template","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ok0c","text":"8.5 ul     PCR grade water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f880r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"700cn","text":"Thermocycling conditions:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jkbk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5jiur","text":"Initial denaturation, 98C for 30 sec","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a46sb","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b5ms3","text":"30 cycles of denaturation, 98C for 10 sec; annealing, 57C for 30 sec; extension, 72C for 30 sec","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"devs5","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b21td","text":"Final extension, 72C for 2 min, then hold at 4C","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8qkla","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fdi75","text":"Pipet 25 ul PCR product from each replicate into a single tube/well for a total of 75 ul per sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dieft","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5c90t","text":"See CALeDNA Replicate Pooling protocol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":17}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"6C0A7DD3DB8C11ECBBC20A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://drive.google.com/file/d/1vl04lB_s18zhWl5XALXPCVkUupIdTbVk/view"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3h9k3","text":"Run gels for all samples to check for successful amplification.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3bnf3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8pecf","text":"See CALeDNA Gel Electrophoresis protocol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":19}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"84394D50DB8C11ECBBC20A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hJ7GFHCdbVI4kTPyzRxdKS15ADRVXIrL/view"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"530uf","text":"Clean PCR products using 1.8X ratio and AMPure XP beads (Beckman Coulter). Use fresh 70% ethanol and elute DNA in 30 ul ultra pure PCR water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"epodv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"342lr","text":"Bead prep: x samples * (1.8)(45 ul sample) * 1.1(10% error) = x ul beads","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ttqp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"67rpj","text":"See CALeDNA PCR Purification protocol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":12,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":16}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"94FB6DA0DB8C11ECBBC20A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Sz1vPSWE8PnpfpYUYPGZ0QVfghjFR54h/view"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"75ud8","text":"Check PCR product sizes for a random mix of samples and controls.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bbhuo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fmcv4","text":"Expected fragment size:     18S-V9, ~130 bp","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"gcph","text":"                                                16S, 114-140 bp","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9oeno","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aplrg","text":"Quantify all pooled sample yields.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9g25i","text":"Using product yields, dilute samples in a new plate to 10 ng in up to 11.25 ul PCR water per sample. If yield is less than 10 ng, then use 11.25 ul product for indexing reactions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4ig4i","text":"Use IDT for Illumina DNA/RNA Unique Dual Indexes (Sets A-D, 20027213-6).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"454s4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6gnur","text":"For each sample, perform PCR in 25 ul reactions with the following reaction chemistry:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17c62","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"28h4p","text":"12.5 ul    NEBNext Ultra II Q5 Master Mix (#M0544)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"81kr1","text":"1.25 ul    Illumina UD indexing primer mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e7q2k","text":"11.25 ul  normalized product","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"60m4i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cqqj2","text":"Thermocycling conditions:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"58gql","text":"Initial denaturation, 95C for 5 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9nhs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"evvos","text":"8 cycles of denaturation at 98C for 20 sec; annealing at 56C for 30 sec; extension at 72C for 3 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9aaen","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6lq10","text":"Final extension, 72C for 5 min, then hold at 4C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"diugj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dgri6","text":"See CALeDNA Indexing PCR protocol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":12}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"4A80AAEBDB8D11ECBBC20A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://drive.google.com/file/d/1kOTtIbevEkWqV7Biw8Gwnl8Y8oZHj62e/view"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a0br2","text":"Dilute primers to 1 uM in PCR water. Set up triplicate PCRs for each sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"19kco","text":"Perform PCRs in 25 ul volumes with the following reaction chemistry:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"argi5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"adht9","text":"12.5 ul   NEBNext Ultra II Q5 Master Mix (#M0544)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6bd1r","text":"5 ul        1 uM fwd primer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4fkqi","text":"5 ul        1 uM rvs primer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7peiu","text":"2.5 ul    undiluted DNA template","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dbg4t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5a9o8","text":"Thermocycling conditions:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2n5kv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cok0p","text":"Initial denaturation, 98C for 30 sec","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2cpll","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"37ek3","text":"35 cycles of denaturation, 98C for 10 sec; annealing, 62C for 30 sec; extension, 72C for 30 sec","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"25k2","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b1vqv","text":"Final extension, 72C for 2 min, then hold at 4C","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9mc7a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"24nda","text":"Pipet 25 ul PCR product from each replicate into a single tube/well for a total of 75 ul per sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6kke9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b89o4","text":"See CALeDNA Replicate Pooling protocol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":12,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":17}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"7BA9D4E6DB8E11ECBBC20A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://drive.google.com/file/d/1vl04lB_s18zhWl5XALXPCVkUupIdTbVk/view"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9ethu","text":"Check product sizes again (see Step 9). Expected fragment size (including index, adapters): 16S, 285-300 bp","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"mqm5","text":"                                                                                                                                                                    18S, 295-320 bp","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"625cd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d0ang","text":"Determine bead ratio using observed fragment sizes after index PCR. Use bead prep calculation from Step 8, adjusted for 25 ul product and appropriate bead ratio from product size check. We used 1.8X.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2uh6p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ci5t","text":"Clean PCR products with AMPure XP beads (Beckman Coulter). Use fresh 70% ethanol and elute DNA in 30 ul ultra pure PCR water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5sh96","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ksbd","text":"See CALeDNA PCR Purification protocol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":12,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":16}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"F34EAA5A391511ED9A700A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://drive.google.com/file/d/1Sz1vPSWE8PnpfpYUYPGZ0QVfghjFR54h/view"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9mvkq","text":"Pool cleaned, indexed samples by equal mass/number of molecules per sample, target final library concentration of 10-15 nM in at least 200 ul. Use fragment size to calculate nM from ng/ul.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4blaq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6tj1j","text":"See CALeDNA Library Pooling protocol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":12,"length":15}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":15}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"5AA0D320391611ED9A700A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://drive.google.com/file/d/1FMbmIhJXcvHN3hsRiPBVyDc4SjSbRJpg/view"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6pd5f","text":"Quantify pooled library and check fragment size (same methods as in previous steps).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"27rkb","text":"Follow 16S Sample Preparation Guide starting at page 17.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":7,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":28}],"data":{}},{"key":"8c123","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3bmo","text":"Prep PhiX Control Kit v3 for 15% spike-in.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"emgbi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2pd69","text":"Sequence with MiSeq v3 600-cycle kit, 2 x 100 PE reads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"768E62C8391611ED9A700A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://support.illumina.com/content/dam/illumina-support/documents/documentation/chemistry_documentation/16s/16s-metagenomic-library-prep-guide-15044223-b.pdf"}}}}
